lines.text: I expected my shooting mishap to be followed by a legal mishap. Well, what do we do now? Shall we have a drink? Make love? Throw things at each other?
I couldn't exactly strangle my motorcycle.
You don't think people are going to come to see you smoke a cigarette, do you?
I never once got on that bike, not even one night, for the last two years without thinking it would be the last time.
So you wanted to kill me because you were afraid something would happen to you?
It's not the motorcycle that's dangerous; it's the fear.
Don't try to kill me off before dessert. The cook makes a remarkable omlette soufflé.
